chapter.title: Known Issues and Caveats
chapter.para: Here is the list of known issues in this release of OpenNMS.

section.title: Current Release
section.para: We are still investigating a socket issue that appears like it may be related to certain uncommon configurations of the IPv6 stack on Linux.

section.title: OpenNMS 1.8.5/1.9.2
section.para: When upgrading OpenNMS to version 1.8.5 or later, it is important to upgrade your remote pollers to 1.8.5 as well. The remote poller wire protocol has changed since 1.8.4.
